Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another
"Earth-Bred Fighters" Category ally on the team upon the
character's entry*
- {passiveImg:once}Chance of evading enemy's attack 20%{passiveImg:up_g} for 1 turn
- {passiveImg:once}Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g} for 5 turns
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- High chance of performing a critical hit
- High chance of evading enemy's attack
- Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of
becoming a Super Attack
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT excluded)
to Rainbow Ki Spheres
*For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained*
- DEF 40%{passiveImg:up_g} and chance of evading enemy's attack 10%{passiveImg:up_g}
before attacking
*For every attack performed*
- {passiveImg:forever}ATK & DEF 40%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 200%)
- {passiveImg:forever}Chance of performing a critical hit 10%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 50%)
*After evading an attack*
- Launches 2 additional attacks, each of which has a high chance
of becoming a Super Attack, within the turn
*As the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn*
- Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of
becoming a Super Attack
*For every Super Attack performed*
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 10%{passiveImg:up_g} within the turn

7718.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn 
and causes immense damage with 
a high chance of stunning the enemy

Active Skill.Name: Extra Large Spirit Ball
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Causes ultimate damage to enemy and, 
within the turn activated, 
attacks guaranteed to hit
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated after the character evades 4 or more 
enemy attacks (including Super Attacks) in battle, 
or when all allies attacking in the same turn are 
"Earth-Bred Fighters" Category characters (once only)
